name: NEO Network Orchestration
description:
Mellanox NEO is a powerful platform for data-center network orchestration, designed to simplify network provisioning, monitoring and operations of the modern data-center.
Mellanox NEO addresses key challenges faced by IT organizations with network deployment and day-to-day operations, including automated provisioning, configuration management and software updates throughout the network fabric.
NEO offers an intuitive web 2.0 GUI to monitor and control your entire cloud network from a single pane of glass. 
#### License:
* Free download
#### Hardware Requirement:
* 1 VM with 2 vCPU, 4GB RAM
#### Platform:
* AHV
#### Support Information:
* Email: support@mellanox.com
* Mellanox Call Center (+1) 954 414 9621, (+1) 954 281 4669
* US Toll-free 86-Mellanox (8663552669)
#### Accessibility:
* http://[IP_ADDRESS]/neo
* SSH Username:root/Password:123456
* Web Username:admin/Password:123456
author: Nutanix
